name: Microsoft Word HTML Document Template
summary: A DOTHTML file is an HTML version of a .DOT file created with Microsoft Word, a word processing application. It contains HTML source code that can be used to display the document with similar formatting to the original DOT file. DOTHTML files are used for viewing published templates in a web browser.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: No longer supported by Microsoft Word

macos.display_name: No longer supported by Microsoft Word
